nodes.bodyText: Naming: is it really a Spring-specific test domain or is it a domain with annotation on an interface?
It's a testdata (= test domain) specifically for Spring. We can't reuse the normal TestdataSolution etc because it needs to be located in the package that spring scans.
What name do you think would be better?
We test a specific situation - annotations on an interface. How about TestdataChainedAnnotatedInterface*?
